snippet: YouTube has been developing features that would preserve its free model, but also give paying subscribers more extensive access to music.
abstract: YouTube signs licensing deal with independent record companies, clearing way for it to introduce long-planned subscription feature to compete with music streaming sites like Spotify and Rhapsody; it has been developing features that would preserve its free model, but also give paying subscribers more extensive access to music.
lead_paragraph: YouTube has been developing features that would preserve its free model, but also give paying subscribers more extensive access to music.

headline.main: Small Labels and YouTube Enter Deal on Licensing
headline.print_headline: Small Labels and YouTube Reach a Deal on Music
